options.name: Raised in Water
options.description: The Tidewalker culture is at home in the water. Your Swim Speed becomes equal to your Movement Speed and you gain +1 Athletics.

options.name: Friend of the Sea
options.description: You You gain +1 Animals and +1 Persuasion. You can communicate basic concepts to Aquatic Beasts and the Level limit determined by your Taming Formula is increased by 2 for Aquatic Beasts.

options.name: Underwater Weapons
options.description: The Tidewalker Heritage involves weapons that work efficiently under water. Gain +1 Attack on Piercing Weapons

options.name: Hazards of the Sea
options.description: Your body is acclimated to the harsh conditions of the deep waters. Gain +3 Cold Mitigation and +3 Fire Mitigation

options.name: Songs of the Deep
options.description: Stories and messages are passed through song and you have learned to both sing and interpret them. Gain +1 Performance, +1 Search and +2 Range on all Ballads.

options.name: Underwater Diplomat
options.description: The Tidwalker culture invovles many different types of Creatures and sharing a common language is important for communication. Learn the Tidal Magical Language and gain +1 Persuasion

options.name: Water Shaper
options.description: You Gain +1 Spell Attack and you can Research Beginner and Journeyman Spells from the Aquamancy School of Magic. You can Research Journeyman Aquamancy Spells at Level 7, Expert at 9 and Master at 11. Additionally, while submerged in water, your Aquamancy Spells are automatically Charged.
